ABSTRACT	O
:	O
A	O
mild	O
and	O
eﬃcient	O
method	O
for	O
the	O
synthesis	O
of	O
3-diﬂuoroacetylated	O
coumarins	O
through	O
visible	O
-	O
light	O
-	O
promoted	O
aryldiﬂuoroacetylation	O
of	O
alkynes	O
with	O
ethyl	O
bromodiﬂuor-	O
oacetate	O
has	O
been	O
developed.	O

of	O
the	O
31P	O
and	O
'H	O
spectra	O
shows	O
that	O

ratio	O
of	O
coordinated	O

to	O
PPN+	O
is	O

:	O

of	O

a	O
ligand	O

%	O
)	O
while	O
X-Phos	O
decreased	O
the	O
catalytic	O
activity	O
(	O
63	O
%	O
).	O

ABSTRACT	O
:	O

-	O

Arguably	O

reaction.2	O

-	O

ureas,5	O

amides,6,7,9−12	O

amines13−15	O

−	O

proton	O

donor	O
(	O

Dipyrromethanes	O
(	O
DPMs	O
)	O
are	O
important	O
building	O
blocks	O
for	O
the	O
synthesis	O
of	O
polypyrrolic	O
macrocycles	O
such	O
as	O
dipyrrins	O
,	O
trans-porphyrins	O
,	O
corroles	O
,	O
or	O
calixpyrroles.12	O
The	O
synthesis	O
of	O
simple	O
meso-functionalized	O
DPMs	O
without	O
additional	O
α-	O
or	O
β-	O
substituents	O
can	O
be	O
carried	O
out	O
by	O
condensation	O
of	O
aldehydes	O
with	O
an	O
excess	O
of	O
pyrrole	O
under	O
acid	O
catalysis.	O

These	O
two	O
dimorphs	O
showed	O
remarkably	O
different	O
in-	O
frared	O
spectra	O
and	O
powder	O
diffraction	O
patterns	O
